collection:
This
Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your
information when you visit our website [https://ai-generative.org](https://ai-
generative.org/) and interact with our custom GPT models.

Information Collection

We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when
registering on the site, using our services, or communicating with us.

This
information may include, but is not limited to, your name, email address, and
any other information you choose to provide.

Use of Information

The information we collect may be used to:

  * Provide, operate, and maintain our website and services

  * Improve, personalize, and expand our website and services

  * Understand and analyze how you use our website and services

  * Develop new products, services, features, and functionality

  * Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, for customer service, updates, and other informational purposes

  * Send you emails

  * Find and prevent fraud

#####  

##### 3\.
